name: Multi Image Posts
author: Tani_Afi

sections.description:
This `Mutli Image Posts` plugin will let you create single/bulk post at once with draft status automatically. It is essential plugin for photo blog or there are number of image posts on a wordpress driven site.

Plugin Main Features are:

  1. Admin User can only access Plugin’s UI.
  2. Start by “Select Image(s)” button for adding (selecting) image to upload from plugin page. If user selects multiple images, multiple box will create for posts.
  3. A box (or multiple ones) create for a post, with image preview display on the left and options on the right.
  4. Form options includes:
  • File name display (minus file extension).
  • Image TITLE, Image ALT TEXT, Caption,Tags and Post Title auto-filled with original file name (user can edit).
  • Categories are selectable via available Categories in a blog.

upon submitting:

  • uploaded Image into Media Library, with TITLE and ALT TEXT being populated properly.
  • create Post Type Image.
  • Set Uploaded image as “Featured Image”. It will automatically insert into the post content with Caption.
  • Set Post(s) Title.
  • Set Image TITLE as “FOCUS KEYWORD” field of the plugin Yoast SEO.
  • Set Tags with user entered data and image title for the post(s).
  • Set Image as a Ping for the post(s).
  • Post(s) will automatically be created as DRAFT status.
sections.installation:
From your WordPress dashboard

  1. Visit ‘Plugins > Add New’
  2. Search for ‘Multi Image Posts’
  3. Activate Multi Image Posts from your Plugins page.
  4. Click on “Auto Posts” in Admin menu.

From WordPress.org

  1. Download Multi Image Posts.
  2. Upload the ‘Multi Image Posts’ directory to your ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory, using your favorite method (ftp, sftp, scp, etc…)
  3. Activate Multi Image Posts from your Plugins page.
  4. Click on “Auto Posts” in Admin menu.
sections.faq:
This is useful for creating bulk post of images?
Yes, of course. The purpose to create this plugin is that a user needs automatic bulk image posting with set of informtaion. It will be helpful for those who work on photo blogs etc.
sections.changelog:
1.3

  • added tags and caption field set as post content and excerpt

1.2

  • tested with wordpress latest verion

1.1

  • updated admin page with text i.e. how to use

1.0

  • Initial release

short_description: This plugin will provide you the facility to create bulk post at once by selecting image from Auto Posts page and you can set information of each post

screenshots.caption: After Click on Submit Post(s) Successfully Created with Draft status.
Post(s) has set with title, content, Featured Image, Tag, selected as a Ping, Type Image and SEO FOCUS KEYWORD.
